direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve user asset information but with different focuses (funding wallet vs. all assets).
Both methods involve accessing and processing user asset-related data.
Both methods modify the user's asset state, albeit in different contexts (funding wallet vs. withdrawal).
Both methods involve transferring assets with similar control flows and parameter handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API requests.
Environment setup is required before accessing the funding wallet.
Both methods verify asset details and handle similar exceptions.
